title: The Harrowing of Sean Hannity
author: VD
content_html:
You can tell by the way he moves his walk
He’s a media ho, no time to talk.
Hooked on that Washington porn
He’s been selling himself since he was born.
Ron Paul’s not on, he’s not O.K.
So we must look the other way.
You should try to understand
The Fox News effect on Man.






Whether Sean’s rotten
Or whether he’s forgotten
He’s stayin’ alive, stayin’ alive.
Feel the party breakin’
And the prostitutes shakin’
And he’s stayin’ alive, stayin’ alive.
Ah, ha, ha, ha,
Stayin’ alive.
Stayin’ alive.
Ah, ha, ha, ha,
Stayin’ alive.









I loved Jamie’s music video as well as the harrowing itself. Deprived of his ability to control the mike, Hannity showed himself to be a coward; he didn’t even have the steel to turn and face his critics. This is true of most of the people in the media, as with only a few exceptions, they’re whiners and criers. They love to dish it out, but they simply cannot take it.

It’s funny, I used to like Fox News and Sean Hannity back when the channel launched. I thought they actually wanted to offer a genuine alternative to the left-liberal media. Now, I simply despise them as shameless defenders of the very evil they pretend to oppose.

I’m not the only one who thinks so either:

The media is generating hate and their own version of blowback. In America, blowback lead to 9/11. What will your blowback lead to? We’re really starting to hate you folks. I was a journalist, I read the NRO, I vote GOP. I hate you. I can’t imagine how others feel right now about reading that misleading crap.

The coming Republican debacle is NOT the result of furious and betrayed conservatives leaving their party, it’s a result of their party’s elite and the “conservative” media dragging their party away from them. George Bush is no conservative. Giuliani is no conservative. Romney is no conservative. McCain is no conservative. And neither is any media whore who champions them.
